json

Description

A JSON library

Author

Tony Garnock-Jones

Version

  • 1.2 handling of unicode escapes [by Dan Muresan]
  • 1.1 Bugfix to handle null
  • 1.0 Initial release

Requires

  • syntax-case
  • packrat

Usage

(require-extension json)

Download

json.egg

Documentation

This extension implements a parser and generator for the JSON data interchange format.

procedure: (json-write OBJECT [PORT])

Writes the Scheme data object OBJECT in JSON format to PORT, which defaults to the value of (current-output-port).

Scheme data is mapped to JSON format in the following way:

Scheme JSON
Hash-table Structure
Vector Structure (assuming vector consists of (SYMBOL . DATA) pairs
List Array
Number Number
Void Null
String or symbol String

procedure: (json-read [PORT])

Reads data in JSON format from PORT, which defaults to the value of (current-input-port).
